description: This file contains test cases for the checkout flow in a React-based e-commerce web application. It tests behaviors such as disabling/enabling the pay button, adding items to the cart, submitting a mock payment, and checking post-payment side effects.

methods.name: test('shows disabled pay button when cart empty and enables with items')
methods.description: Tests if the pay button is disabled when the cart is empty and enabled when items are added.

methods.name: test('successful mock payment clears cart and navigates home')
methods.description: Simulates a complete checkout process: adding an item, entering payment details, submitting payment, and verifying subsequent UI changes and alerts.
